snippet: Elizabeth Warren's new 30-second advertisement is the first to venture off safe ground and is a sign of how much the Senate race in Massachusetts is intensifying in the run-up to the first debate.
abstract: Elizabeth Warren's new 30-second advertisement is the first to venture off safe ground and is a sign of how much the Senate race in Massachusetts is intensifying in the run-up to the first debate.

headline.main: Warren Ad Paints Her as a Fighter, and Throws a Punch
